name: Ryan Lee Ramos
location: Portland, Or ( traveling the country in a bus)
coverLetter:
My name is Ryan Lee Ramos. I am a hard-working, honest, self driven individual that is seeking knowledge within the cannabis industry. Though I don't have hands on experience, I believe I make up for it in my drive to learn and my ability to work hard.  I require no accommodations as far as food or shelter for I am traveling on a school bus named Mufasa. I am grateful to have had the opportunity to borrow moment of your time, I look forward to chatting with you in the future!

Ryan Lee Ramos
